Html:
Hello All,

               I want to draw a graph like the one that can be seen in simulation samples a dynamic graph.But I want to go a bit step ahead.I want to plot say 3 lines in graph and all three have different x-axis and same y-axis same chart or grid.This would be done in WPF .Also I want to draw the x-axis and y-axis pro grammatically.But don't know how and where to start.Any samples or links would be great help.

 

I hope I am clear .

 

Thanks in advance
